channel.title: Professional Review on
channel.description: Recent content in Professional Review on

item.description: Communication Task Topics and Response Formats As taken from the ICE guidance, the following topics and responses can be mixed-and-matched in order to make up the Communication Task question.

item.title: Briefing Note
item.description: Briefing Note [!NOTE] Briefing Note A briefing paper, or briefing note, is a document that is used to inform decision makers (a board, a politician, etc.

item.title: Communication Task
item.description: Communication Task *See Communication Task Example for an example answer, and discussion around the Communication Task. See Communication Task Example (Productivity) for my answer in my first Professional Review.

item.title: Communication Task Example
item.description: Communication Task Example Taken from The Civil Engineering Exam - the Communication Task Example See more about the Communication Task here.

item.title: Communication Task Example (Productivity)
item.description: Communication Task Example (Productivity) I got good feedback on my Communication Task, which was presented in the following format. Format 1 You have been asked to write a piece by a joruanlist about this scenario / situation for inclusion in an industry supplement.

item.title: Decarbonisation
item.description: Decarbonisation and climate impacts There is some overlap in the areas of decarbonisation and climate impacts in regards to the Communication Task, so both can be covered in this note.

item.title: Engineering Council (EC)
item.description: Engineering Council (EC) The engineering council (EC) regulates the basic qualifications of all UK professional engineers. It ==sets out benchmark standards for their academic education and requirements== for three registration categories: Incorporated Engineer (IEng), Chartered Engineer (CEng) and EngTech.

item.title: ICE Code of Conduct
item.description: ICE Code of Conduct The ICE Code of Conduct can be summarised by one phrase: do the right thing. The code of conduct sets out a set of duties which should be followed by ICE members in order to behave ethically and in standing with the ICE.

item.title: Journalist Piece
item.description: Journalist Piece I believe a journalist piece should be informative but almost from the perspective of someone going in without knowing something.

item.title: Letter to Residents
item.description: Letter to Residents [!NOTE] Letter to residents A letter to residents should be to provide information to a set group of people, with perhaps a greater focus on actionable steps they can take.

item.title: Resitting your Professional Review
item.description: Resitting your Professional Review If, like me, you did not pass your professional review on the first try, do not worry!

item.title: Summary Note
item.description: Summary Note [!NOTE] Summary Note The purpose of a summary note is to provide a brief summary of a topic so that the reader gets a general comprehensive understanding.
